entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this morning then light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
